thread.title: Houston's "BE SOMEONE" graffiti is changed...again.

author: Fernando Ramirez
title: Houston's "BE SOMEONE" graffiti is changed...again.
text:
Photo: Jeff J Mitchell/Getty Images Image 20 of 20 Houston's "BE SOMEONE" graffiti is changed...again. 1 / 20 Back to Gallery 
Hours before Super Bowl LI, one of Houston's most iconic landmarks has been vandalized, again. 
For the second time this week, I-45's "BE SOMEONE" graffiti has been messed with, partially covering its well-known message with an unfinished phrase: "BE YO." 
BARBECUE SCENE: Mike Pence stops by Pappa's Bar-B-Q in Houston ahead of Super Bowl 51 
One observer on Reddit suggested the artist failed to finish their work, which would have presumably read "BE YOURSELF." 
On Tuesday , commuting Houstonians woke up to the graffiti installation painted with a bright, blue "FOOTBALL" instead of its familiar message. 
Less than a day later, the graffiti was restored by the original artist. 
Click through above to see the world's most imaginative graffiti. 
Berlin Wall monument at Rice University tagged with Donald Trump graffiti Media: MediaOS Video
